Name: Conductor's Top Hat
Title: The Sound of Ancient Music: Conductor's Top Hat
Desc: "The members then turned the notes into words and recorded their journey in a book.\nThis book, The Widsith as they called it, was still held tightly in the conductor's hands even after his death."

Talent.Name: Conductor's Top Hat
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After you switch to the character to which this is attached:</color> $[K56] the card with the highest original Elemental Dice Cost in your Hand and change 2 Elemental Dice into $[K411], and spend 1 less Elemental Die the next time the character uses a Skill or plays a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent. (Once per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)

K56.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Discard</color>
K56.Desc: Use Action Cards or Character Skill effects to Discard Action Cards from Hand or Deck.
